sentences.sentence: Raj Reddy (born June 13, 1937) was born in India.
Now people are thanking Dr Reddy for buffering India from the global economic storm.
sentences.translation: 现在人们正感谢雷迪博士，因为他使得印度抵御了全球经济风暴。

sentences.sentence: Chris Reddy, a Marine chemist, regretted that scientists had not been able to get more samples of the deep-sea dispersant-oil mixture.
sentences.translation: 令海洋化学家克里斯·雷迪懊恼的是，科学家没有能够取到更多深海分散剂与石油的混合物样品。
